de.fh_erfurt.cst.util

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fh_erfurt.cst.util.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    A conveniece class which provides a number of static methods which can be used accross the application.

      The one instance of DecimalFormat to be used across the application

        Formats a floating point number into a localized string
        Parameters:
        number - the number to be formatted
        Returns:
        the number as localized string representation

      • invalidateDecimalFormat

        public static void invalidateDecimalFormat()
        Resets the the DecimalFormat instance for the application.

        This is necessay if the user changes the language in the system settings and then return into the application.

        See Also:
        getDecimalFormatInstance()

        Rounds a floating point number according to the desired number of decimal places
        Parameters:

        decimalPlaces - the number of descimal places in the result
        Returns:
        the rounded number
